welcome_message_body: Welcome to Brossard, Canada! Enjoy the charm of our diverse city, known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and make unforgettable memories here.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Hubert Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Jean Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at St Jean Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at the airport, primarily used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.
